tutorials.title: LED Controller
tutorials.intro: This is a simple LED controller that allows you to turn on and off an LED with a button.

components.name: LED
components.description: A light-emitting diode (LED) is a semiconductor light source that emits light when current flows through it. Electrons in the semiconductor recombine with electron holes, releasing energy in the form of photons. This effect is called electroluminescence.

tutorials.story: Sie können eine Verbindung vom GPIO 23 des ESP32 zu einer beliebigen LED herstellen. Die LED wird mit der Funktion 'ledcWrite' angesteuert. Der PWM-Wert, der die Helligkeit der LED steuert. Der Wert reicht von 0 (aus) bis 255 (maximale Helligkeit). Diese Funktion steuert die Helligkeit der LED, indem sie einen PWM-Wert (Pulsweitenmodulation) auf den angegebenen Kanal schreibt. Ein Beispiel: 'ledcWrite(0, 128)' setzt die Helligkeit der LED auf 50%. Flashen Sie die Solution auf den ESP32 und sehen Sie, wie die LED mit dem Schieberegler gesteuert wird.

solution.explanation: The LED controller uses a button to turn the LED on and off. When the button is pressed, the LED turns on. When the button is released, the LED turns off. The button is connected to a digital pin on the microcontroller. The LED is connected to another digital pin. When the button is pressed, the microcontroller reads a HIGH signal from the button pin and turns the LED on. When the button is released, the microcontroller reads a LOW signal from the button pin and turns the LED off.

tutorials.title: Temperature Observing
tutorials.intro: In this project, you will read the Temperature from a sensor and display it on the screen.

components.name: TMP36
components.description: THE TMP36 is a low voltage, precision centigrade temperature sensor. It provides a voltage output that is linearly proportional to the Celsius temperature. It also doesn't require any external calibration to provide typical accuracies of ±1°C at +25°C and ±2°C over the −40°C to +125°C temperature range.

tutorials.story: You are a zookeeper and you need to monitor the temperature of the animals in the zoo. You have a temperature sensor that can help you with this task. You need to connect the sensor to the board and display the temperature on the screen.
